location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain Charles William Burton, Camp Seehur to Colonel Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter thanking Pelly for sending the letter from Aitchison; and discussing some disputed land near Bursoo [Budsu] which is nearly 100 miles from the road to Bickaneer [Bīkāner], including the difficulties in reaching it, the poor quality of the roads, the lack of available water and the need for the Jeypore [Jaipur] and Bickaneer Durbar to have enough time to inform their parties to meet him there.The letter goes on to discuss arrangements with Dr. Babler who was awaiting his arrival in Bickaneer and his hopes of settling the border dispute.
